meanings.definition: The act of discontinuing or ceasing something.
meanings.sent1: The discontinuance of the old policy caused confusion among the employees.
meanings.sent2: The discontinuance of the train service led to inconvenience for commuters.
meanings.sent3: The discontinuance of the daily donut tradition left everyone feeling a bit sad.
meanings.sent4: The discontinuance of the music abruptly silenced the lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The sudden discontinuance of the water supply shocked the entire neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The state of being discontinued or stopped.
meanings.sent1: After the discontinuance of the project, the team disbanded.
meanings.sent2: The discontinuance of the production line resulted in layoffs.
meanings.sent3: The discontinuance of the rain brought relief to the flooded streets.
meanings.sent4: The discontinuance of the internet connection left him feeling isolated.
meanings.sent5: The sudden discontinuance of the noise made the forest eerily quiet.
